name: Down Some Stairs (500 Hz)
description:
the first in a small series based on “Down Some Stairs,” the opening track from the album Darkness Within Darkness (2003) from the model

down down down
memory work, like dream work, can get wild

a 16-second sound and vision loop at 106 bpm filtered down to 500 Hz

collectors are welcome to use what they hear and see in their own work if interested, consistent with an Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0) license.

(contact us for high resolution files)

a portion of proceeds will be donated to The Marshall Project, a nonpartisan, nonprofit news organization that seeks to create & sustain a sense of national urgency about the criminal justice system
